snippet: In the first installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we gather a group of amazing 19th and 20th-century images that illustrate the cultural tension between India and its occupying power.
abstract: In the first installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we gather a group of amazing 19th and 20th-century images that illustrate the cultural tension between India and its occupying power.

headline.main: Vintage Studio Portraits of Indian Women From the Peak of British Colonialism
